documents.title: API Authentication Guide
documents.content: This guide explains how to authenticate with our API using OAuth2 and JWT tokens.

documents.title: Database Setup
documents.content: Configure your PostgreSQL database with proper indexing and connection pooling.

documents.question: How do I reset my password?
documents.answer: Go to settings, click on security, and select reset password option.

documents.question: What payment methods are supported?
documents.answer: We support credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.
